admission.description: A Helm chart for Kompass Admission Controller Subsystem

pullPolicy.description: Image pull policy (e.g., Always, IfNotPresent, Never)
pullPolicy.title: pullPolicy

replicaCount.description: Number of replicas for the deployment
replicaCount.title: replicaCount

tolerations.description: Tolerations for scheduling onto nodes with taints
tolerations.title: tolerations

secret.description: Override the Kompass Insights generated secret name
secret.title: secret

service.description: Override the Kompass Insights generated service name
service.title: service

remote.description: Enable or disable remote logging features
remote.title: remote

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number of unavailable pods in the pod disruption budget
maxUnavailable.title: maxUnavailable

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account
annotations.title: annotations

admission.title: kompass-admission-controller

accessKeyID.description: If you put the values here, the secret won't be used
accessKeyID.title: accessKeyID

encryptedCredentials.description: If you put the value here, the secret won't be used
encryptedCredentials.title: encryptedCredentials

metrics-server.description: Metrics Server is a scalable, efficient source of container resource metrics for Kubernetes built-in autoscaling pipelines.

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the API service
annotations.title: annotations

caBundle.description: The PEM encoded CA bundle for TLS verification
caBundle.title: caBundle

create.description:
Specifies if the v1beta1.metrics.k8s.io API service should be created.

You typically want this enabled! If you disable API service creation you have to
manage it outside of this chart for e.g horizontal pod autoscaling to
work with this release.
create.title: create

insecureSkipTLSVerify.description: Specifies whether to skip TLS verification
insecureSkipTLSVerify.title: insecureSkipTLSVerify

deploymentAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to the deployment
deploymentAnnotations.title: deploymentAnnotations

global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

enabled.description:
Specifies if metrics-server should be started in hostNetwork mode.

You would require this enabled if you use alternate overlay networking for pods and
API server unable to communicate with metrics-server. As an example, this is required
if you use Weave network on EKS
enabled.title: enabled

tag.description: Overrides the image tag whose default is v{{ .Chart.AppVersion }}
tag.title: tag

create.description: Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created
create.title: create

annotations.description: Annotations to add to the service account
annotations.title: annotations

create.description: Specifies whether a service account should be created
create.title: create

name.description:
The name of the service account to use.
If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template
name.title: name

secrets.description:
The list of secrets mountable by this service account.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/labels-annotations-taints/#enforce-mountable-secrets
secrets.title: secrets

metrics-server.title: metrics-server

expansionSize.description:
Size by which to expand a PVC that exceeded its disk utilization threshold
Can be either percentage or resource quantity ("20%"/"5Gi")
expansionSize.title: expansionSize

threshold.description: Percentage threshold to limit PVC utilization
threshold.title: threshold
